name: Firefox 29 Arrives with Customization Mode, New Design
caption: thenextweb.com
description: Mozilla today officially launched Firefox 29 for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android. This is a massive release: Firefox Sync has been revamped and is now pow

data.message:
I wasn't sure about the new UI of Firefox. But I've been using it for about 6 months now since it was added to Nightly, and I have to say, it's very good.
It encouraged me to get rid of the bookmarks toolbar, and the search box. Now, I just use the awesome bar (address bar) to search bookmarks, history, and online all from one location. It works really well.
